gpu: X.Org Radeon RX Vega (VEGA10, DRM 3.26.0, 4.18.12-1-MANJARO, LLVM 7.0.0)
notes: Does not start when launched from steam. You have to start it from the normal company of heroes game with the launch options "-mod Europe_At_War". Then it works perfectly like the normal company of heroes.
title: Europe at War
